ThingDef.label: tatos
ThingDef.description: Tatos are a mutated hybrid of the tomato and potato plants, created by the two plants pollinating one another. The 'fruit' of the plant has the skin and stem of a tomato, and a brown flesh reminiscent of a potato. Commonly cultivated in the Commonwealth, Appalachia and the Island, its fruit is notable for being nutritious and easy to grow, though its taste leaves something to be desired.

ThingDef.label: razorgrains
ThingDef.description: Razorgrain allows the player character to plant seeds, which can be harvested for food. It can also be used to feed the residents with 0.5 food and can be used to make various items at the cooking station.
